name: e2e-electron
description: An application demonstrating all approaches of using zubridge with Electron
author: goosewobbler

scripts.clean: pnpm clean:cache && pnpm dlx shx rm -rf ./node_modules pnpm-lock.yaml
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:node && pnpm run typecheck:web
scripts.dev:redux: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux ELECTRON_ENTRY=./out-redux/main/index.js WATCH_UI=true electron-vite dev
scripts.dev:custom: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom ELECTRON_ENTRY=./out-custom/main/index.js WATCH_UI=true electron-vite dev
scripts.build: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm build:zustand-basic && pnpm build:zustand-handlers && pnpm build:zustand-reducers && pnpm build:redux && pnpm build:custom
scripts.build:zustand-basic: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-basic electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-basic electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:zustand-handlers: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-handlers electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-handlers electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:zustand-reducers: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-reducers electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=zustand-reducers electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:redux: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=redux electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.build:custom: cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom electron-vite build && cross-env ZUBRIDGE_MODE=custom electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.ts
scripts.local:dev: cd ../.. && pnpm clean:cache && pnpm build:packages && cd - && cross-env DEBUG=zubridge:*,example-app:* pnpm dev
